Package beans

Class Historique

java.lang.Object
beans.Historique
public class Historique
extends java.lang.Object
It is a model class in order to represent history
Author:
mounsit kaddami yan perez

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addChoiceToHis​(Choix choice)
    add a choice to the history
    java.util.LinkedList<Choix> getHisChoices()
    getter for the list of the choices that the history contains
    java.lang.String getStory()
    getter for the title of the story to which the history is associated
    java.lang.String getUser()
    getter for the user name of the reader to who the history is associated
    boolean hasBeenRead​(int idParagraph, javax.sql.DataSource dataSource)
    To know if a paragraph has been read or not : to use in case if there is a condition on the access to a certain choice : used after the method getConditionAccess on ChoixDAO
    java.lang.Integer removeLastChoice()
    this method allows to remove the last choice indicated in the history, it is actually used when the user chooses to get back to a previous choice, so all the history must be modified
    void setHisChoices​(java.util.LinkedList<Choix> hisChoices)
    setter for the list of the choices that the history contains
    void setStory​(java.lang.String story)
    setter for the title of the story to which the history is associated
    void setUser​(java.lang.String user)
    setter for the user name of the reader to who the history is associated

    • hasBeenRead

      public boolean hasBeenRead​(int idParagraph, javax.sql.DataSource dataSource)
      To know if a paragraph has been read or not : to use in case if there is a condition on the access to a certain choice : used after the method getConditionAccess on ChoixDAO
      Parameters:
      idParagraph -
      dataSource -
      Returns:
      a boolean indicating if the paragraph has been read or not

    • removeLastChoice

      public java.lang.Integer removeLastChoice()
      this method allows to remove the last choice indicated in the history, it is actually used when the user chooses to get back to a previous choice, so all the history must be modified
